title: PrismSettings
description: This element holds the Setting applied to a Prism used in the Light Path during the acquisition of this Channel as well as a reference (the ID attribute) to the Prism in question.

subCategoriesOrder.PrismSettings: This element holds the Setting applied to a Prism used in the Light Path during the acquisition of this Channel as well as a reference (the ID attribute) to the Prism in question.
subCategoriesOrder.TransmissionWavelengthRangeSettings: This element records the range of Transmission Wavelengths that were set for this optical component during the Acquisition of this Image. It also records the maximum amount of light transmitted. Multiple of this elements can be used.
subCategoriesOrder.ReflectionWavelengthRangeSettings: This element records the range of Reflection Wavelengths that were set for this optical component during the Acquisition of this Image. It also records the maximum amount of light transmitted. Multiple of this elements can be used.

ID.description: This is the Unique Identifier of the device used in this case.

PositionSetting.description: This field refers to the Wollaston Prism position that was set during the Acquisition of this Image. The Position must match the Wollaston Prism Settings found at the base of the objective lens.

TransmissionWavelengthRangeSettings.description: This element records the range of Transmission Wavelengths that were set for this optical component during the Acquisition of this Image. It also records the maximum amount of light transmitted. Multiple of this elements can be used.

Transmittance.description: This field records the maximum amount of light this optical component is capable of transmitting in this Wavelength Range, at the peak Wavelength. It is represented as a fractional value from 0.0 to 1.0.

CutOn.description: This field records the Wavelength(s) below which there is less than 50% Transmittance for this optical element.

CutOff.description: This field records the Wavelength(s) above which there is less than 50% Transmittance for this optical element.

ReflectionWavelengthRangeSettings.description: This element records the range of Reflection Wavelengths that were set for this optical component during the Acquisition of this Image. It also records the maximum amount of light transmitted. Multiple of this elements can be used.

Reflectance.description: This field records the maximum amount of light this optical component is capable of reflecting in this Wavelength Range, at the peak Wavelength. It is represented as a fractional value from 0.0 to 1.0.

CutOn.description: This field records the Wavelength(s) below which there is less than 50% Transmittance for this optical element.

CutOff.description: This field records the Wavelength(s) above which there is less than 50% Transmittance for this optical element.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
